name: Lunk
description:
Controls: W,A,S,D (Or Arrow keys) and use the mouse to aim and click to shoot.

When creating your waves (FOR THE TIME BEING BEFORE PEOPLE START GETTING TRIGGERED. Well if you are Triggered then REEEEEEEEEEEEEE back to you too)

As I was saying when creative waves take the wave number into account of how many Enemies will spawn (Obviously if you have a summoner that will spawn more than one because the Summoner is the main enemy.

When you see some almighty text you know you have finished the game. Currently there is no reset function. So just hit F5. It isn't the quickest. But it will do.
